prompt.enable: Unlock your device once to enable the feature.
prompt.disable: Unlock your device to disable the auto-lock.

trusted-services.info: Trusted Services are web services that are allowed to interact with Solar wallet by requesting account data or proposing transactions. You can add a new service once it tries to interact with Solar.

confirm.title: Confirm removal
confirm.text: The service will be removed from your trust list. Are you sure?
